description: `Crafter` makes NBT crafting easy as ever! It supports tags, shaped and shapeless, custom nbt, shift-clicking, and nbt-transferring (think smithing table). `Crafter` also has an addon that adds all vanilla recipes to it.
Adds the vanilla recipes to the Smithed Crafter
One library containing all the ones below!
This library helps manage usage of the actionbar by aggregating usage by priority. This allows persistent messages to display without interrupting more urgent notification type messages.
Handle the placing of custom blocks in one command!
`Damage` allows you to deal variable damage based on a score!
Custom durability made simple, just add some nbt and you're done.
Stop Raiders and the Undead from attacking your custom mobs!
